title: Looking for Luxury Hotels in Patnitop? (praveen kaushal)
text: By praveen kaushal Sep 9, 2015 Patnitop is an enchanting hill station located in the beautiful state of Jammu & Kashmir. Thousands of people flooding the city to beat the summer time heat and experience the exotic beauty of nature. The relaxing ambience of this heavenly town attracts peace lovers, honeymooners every day. Some of the prime destinations in the city include The Cobra Temple, Kud, Shiva Garh, and Madhatop. The best time to visit this amazing place is from October to November and February to March. Many festivals are also held during these many months so it's better to book rooms in advance in your favourite hotels in Patnitop to escape last minute hassles.There are many budget and luxury hotels in Patnitop that cater to the needs of both business corporates and amusement seekers. Some of the reputed hotels worth mentioning include Vardaan Resorts Patnitop and Asia the Oasis Resort. Encased by lush greenery Vardaan Resorts is a haven of tranquility for pleasure seekers and peace lovers. This grand resort provides luxuriously appointed rooms that are laced with all the modern comforts for your convenience. Rooms at this hotel can be identified into valley facing rooms, superior rooms, and regular rooms. Facilities at the hotel include front desk, air-conditioning, office meeting facilities, laundry services, and more.If you are looking for pocket-friendly lodging options, you must stay at Asia the Oasis Resort. Set amidst exotic environs, this special property provides tastefully done rooms that are loaded with all the modern comforts. From soft spongy beds to lavish bathrooms guests at the hotel can enjoy every little thing they need to enjoy a relaxing stay. The hotel is conveniently located near the railway station, airport, and bus stand making it a favorite among tourists. Plenty of facilities and services are provided to the guests and some of them include satellite television, multi-cuisine restaurant, telephone& fax, indoor games, safe deposit lockers, and much more. The heartwarming hospitality, impressive services, and wide array of facilities make this hotel the best in town. So don't you want to spend your holidays in style? Just book your rooms in any of the hotels in Patnitop for an excellent holiday experience in the mighty Himalayan ranges!
